title: Makes provisions with respect to the disposition of fine money imposed for infractions by the holder of a conditional license
summary: Requires a fine for violation of the conditions of a conditional license, issued after conviction of driving while under the influence of drugs or alcohol, to be paid to the county where such violation occurred if such county has a special traffic options program for driving while intoxicated; relates to the distribution of the mandatory surcharge for certain alcohol-related convictions.
